name: Hot Potato! Ludum Dare 50 submission
description: You are a potato that is trying its best to avoid becoming mashable OR salad-able (real word). The air is your enemy, and you must cancel out its temperature with some hot and cold places. Jump around the kitchen and consider your route through the obstacles, as the environment and appliances are bound to change on the whim of a divine being that wants dinner and a show.
